title: "Don't get Rengar ulted"
body:
I was just told that in one of my games by Lee Sin.

How have I been so blind? The obvious counterplay to Rengar is just to never get ulted by him, ever.

Boom.

Just dodge the half global true sight

Just dodge the point-blank bola leap from 900 units away.

Just dodge the the double Q

It's never been so easy - just dodge the Rengar ult

XD

If you're talking about normal wards, then sure you could if you know it'll be safe enough to roam the jungle throwing down wards, which basically forces your entire team to do it together since Rengar loves when he can find people solo roaming around, plus you would need to redo it again after 3 minutes. As for pink wards, it's hard enough to encourage your team to buy it and since it's limited to 1 per person you can't do it alone. Even if you actually do find him with a ward, still annoying to deal with since he has a really high movement speed from Ultimate + Trophies + {{item:3142}}  + the range he gets from his jump from stealth/bush, even if you saw him coming he'll probably still be fast enough to run past your team and jump and instant kill your adc.

NEXT!

That suggestion was actually really good. Just because you had a terrible player on your team does not make the suggestion bad. Play Poppy yourself if you want to do it correctly (if you can do it correctly)

The suggestion is great but there's always a way around it. If poppy sees the ! and pops her w, rengar can delay the jump until her w is over. You would have to pop w as soon as he appears which the reaction time has to be very quick. Also the shorter the jump distance between rengar and his target, the quicker you would have to react.
The suggestion is still poor since Poppy is not going to be in every game Rengar is in. Counterpicks will never equal counterplay.
